QuestData.Title: Waste of Flesh
QuestData.Description: Look at these fools. Half of them won't even make it past this trial.$B$BThey are not worthy of ascending into our inner circles. But perhaps... perhaps they are worthy of menial service.$B$BTake this gem and utilize its power to save some of the less competent supplicants. Those who have no chance of succeeding. Those already on fire, preferably.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Frostgale Crystal to extinguish the flames on 4 Immolated Supplicants.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find suitable servants for me, $ndamus?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $ndamus. I'm having the servants you chose for me briefed on their new duties.
